Translations.Text: Roh blown whereupon they vzostup z grave ist ich Lord
They say Woe do us. Kto resurrected us our smrt? This bol co the Vela Gracious promised Posol je na pravo
All berie je 1 blow whereupon they zvolat before us
Ze dni ziaden soul zlo v the maly Ona platit precisely whatever ona robit
dwellers Raj bol lenze dni happily busy
They abide ich spouses dobry zaclonit enjoying comfortable zariadenie
They have ovocie therein; they have anything they zelat
Mat rad for ona O guilty jeden ona je set aside
robi ja nie covenant ona O Dieta Adam ze ona nie kult devil Ze he bol tvoj zapalisty enemy
A ze ona kult Mna alone This je na pravo chodnicek
He zmylit multitudes z ona. Ona nie possess any chapat
Dnes ona burn it consequence tvoj disbelief
Dni my zapecatit ich usta; ich hands nohy bear svedok everything they robit
My will my zavoj ich oci consequently when they seek chodnicek they nie see
My will my zmrazit them v miesto; thus they viem neither move forward nor ist
